Title: Closer
Actors: Natalie Portman, Jude Law, Julia Roberts, Clive Owen
Plot: Smart-but-ineffectual journalist Dan "We use euphemisms!" cannot decide between his girlfriend, loving-but-clingy waitress Alice, or his lover cold-but-intellectual photographer Anna; herself indecisive between Dan and honest-but-thuggish "You're bloody gorgeous!" doctor Larry. The film puts the four leading characters in a box and strips them apart.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 22 wins & 48 nominations.
